snippet: The cheapest single-game ticket for marquee dates will be $63, a 75 percent increase, but season-ticket plans will include discounts.
abstract: New York Mets will raise single-game ticket prices in nearly every category for the 2013 season, while lowering prices for some games as part of season-ticket plans; strategy is aimed at getting fans to attend games they might otherwise skip.
lead_paragraph: The cheapest single-game ticket for marquee dates will be $63, a 75 percent increase, but season-ticket plans will include discounts.

headline.seo: Mets Raise Single-Game Ticket Prices for 2013
headline.main: Mets Raise Single-Game Prices and Push Season-Ticket Deals
headline.print_headline: Mets Raise Single-Game Prices and Push Season-Ticket Deals
